import React from 'react' import Logo from "../images/logo.png" import Demo from '../pages/Demo' import { InvoiceNum } from '../pages/Invoice' import axios from "axios" import "../App.css" import { FilledInput, Input, OutlinedInput, TextField } from '@material-ui/core' let success=document.getElementById('table_body') let remove=document.getElementById("danger") function InvoiceUI() { function clean_first_tr(firstTr){ let children=firstTr.children; children=Array.isArray(children) ? children : Object.values(children); children.array.forEach(x => { console.log(x) }); } function Create_tr(success){ let table_body=document.getElementById("table_body") let first_tr=table_body.firstElementChild; let tr_clone=first_tr.cloneNode(true); table_body.append(tr_clone); clean_first_tr(table_body.firstElementChild) } return ( <>
   

Supplier,

Client,

Item Description Price Quantity Total
1100

Terms and Conditions

1-Please pay within 15 days from the date of invoice, overdue interest @14% will be charged on delayed payments.

2-Please mention invoice number printed at the top of the invoice when remitting funds.

Sub Total: 1420
Tax: 40
Deliver: 100
Total: 1560
 
        
) } export default InvoiceUI
